alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Jefferson; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 9:19AM CDT until March 24 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Cahaba River At Centreville affecting Bibb, Perry and Dallas Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Cahaba River Near Cahaba Heights affecting Bibb, Jefferson and Shelby Counties. .Heavy rainfall over the last 24 hours will cause rises over the Cahaba River basin, and a flood warning remains in effect for the Cahaba River near Cahaba Heights and near Centreville. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cahaba River Near Cahaba Heights. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs in the Cahaba Heights area. At 17.0 feet, Flooding of some commercial property in the area begins as stages continues to rise. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 9.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 16.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
